attributes.action: POOR TREATMENT IN LATER LIFE ON THE N.H.S
attributes.additional_details: DURING MY LIFE  I HAVE BEEN TREATED FOR VARIOUS AILMENTS BY THE NATIONAL HEALTH SERVICE  SOME OF THESE AILMENTS WERE SERIOUS AND A SURGICAL OPERATION WAS REQUIRED WHERE OTHERS WERE NOT SO SERIOUS WHERE MEDICATION SUFFICED   . I HAVE WORKED ALL MY LIFE AND ACCORDINGLY PAID MY DUES , WHAT I WOULD LIKE INVESTIGTED AND MADE PUBLIC IS WHY  100 % OF THE TREATMENTS INCLUDING INVESTIGATORY AND A MAJOR OPERATION WERE A COMPLETE SUCCESS IN MY YOUNGER AGED YEARS AND NOW IN MY LATER YEARS  CANNOT EVEN GET A POSITIVE INVESTIGATORY PROCEDURE ADMINISTERED TO ME LET ALONE A REMEDY FOR A CURE EVEN THOUGH I BELEIVE AND TOLD THEM SO THAT I HAVE GOT A LIFE THREATENING CONDITION
